pr_title: TSK-987: Fix some problems reported by spotbugs

timeline.message: TSK-987: Fix some problems reported by spotbugs

timeline.bodyText: why is this a bug? Performance? Since getClass() requires an instant and calls a virtual method?
timeline.author: mustaphazorgati

replies.bodyText:
Probably this:
UI: Usage of GetResource may be unsafe if class is extended (UI_INHERITANCE_UNSAFE_GETRESOURCE)
Calling this.getClass().getResource(...) could give results other than expected if this class is extended by a class in another package.
Also see this: https://bz.apache.org/netbeans/show_bug.cgi?id=122477
replies.author: gitgoodjhe
